metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: You can test your jQuery skills with W3Schools' Exercises.
content.html: You can test your jQuery skills with W3Schools' Exercises.

content.text: We have gathered a variety of jQuery exercises (with answers) for each jQuery Chapter.
content.html: We have gathered a variety of jQuery exercises (with answers) for each jQuery Chapter.

content.text: Try to solve an exercise by filling in the missing parts of a code. If you're stuck, hit the "Show Answer" button to see what you've done wrong.
content.html: Try to solve an exercise by filling in the missing parts of a code. If you're stuck, hit the "Show Answer" button to see what you've done wrong.

content.text: You will get 1 point for each correct answer. Your score and total score will always be displayed.
content.html: You will get 1 point for each correct answer. Your score and total score will always be displayed.

content.text: If you don't know jQuery, we suggest that you read our jQuery Tutorial from scratch.
content.html: If you don't know jQuery, we suggest that you read our jQuery Tutorial from scratch.

content.text: Get certified by completing the JQUERY course
content.html: Get certified by completing the JQUERY course
